body:
this comment is confusing because of the overload of "empty" to mean the size of a scalar and having no elements.  How about something like:

"cannot construct sparse tensor with 0 dimensions and no values; you must specify at least 1 dimension if you want to create a sparse tensor with no elements, or you must provide ..."
body_html:
this comment is confusing because of the overload of "empty" to mean the size of a scalar and having no elements. How about something like:

"cannot construct sparse tensor with 0 dimensions and no values; you must specify at least 1 dimension if you want to create a sparse tensor with no elements, or you must provide ..."
body_text:
